upload.title: Upload Documents
upload.dragDrop: or drag and drop PDF files here
upload.multipleFiles: You can select multiple PDF files at once
upload.streamlinePropertyCasualty: Streamline Your Property & Casualty Insurance Underwriting
upload.introLife: Transform complex life insurance applications and medical documents into actionable insights using advanced AI analysis powered by Amazon Bedrock and Claude Haiku 4.5. Purpose-built for life insurance underwriters to automatically extract, analyze, and evaluate risk factors from application packets.
upload.introPropertyCasualty: Transform complex property & casualty insurance applications and ACORD forms into actionable insights using advanced AI analysis powered by Amazon Bedrock and Claude Haiku 4.5. Purpose-built for P&C insurance underwriters to automatically extract, analyze, and evaluate property risk factors from application packets.

documentAnalysis.item1: Process complete life insurance application packets
documentAnalysis.item2: Extract medical history and risk factors
documentAnalysis.item3: Automatic classification of APS and lab reports

documentAnalysis.item1: Process complete P&C insurance application packets
documentAnalysis.item2: Extract property details and risk factors

interactiveAssistant.item1: Query property details and risk factors

chat.greeting: Hi! I'm your AI assistant. I've analyzed this document and can help answer any questions you have about it.
chat.greetingPropertyCasualty: Hello! I'm your Property & Casualty insurance underwriting assistant. I've analyzed this document and can help with questions about property details, risk factors, and coverage considerations.
chat.greetingLife: Hello! I'm your Life Insurance underwriting assistant. I've analyzed this document and can help with questions about medical history, risk factors, and policy considerations.
chat.greetingGeneric: Hi! I'm your AI assistant. How can I help with this document?
chat.placeholder: Ask me anything about the document...

agentAction.title: AI Agent Action Complete
agentAction.subtitle: Our AI agent has processed your document and taken action
agentAction.emailSentDetails: The agent has sent an email based on the document analysis.
agentAction.applicationReviewedDetails: The agent has determined this application requires review.
agentAction.actionTakenDetails: The agent has completed processing this document.

created.details: Job has been created and is waiting for document upload to complete...

uploadPending.details: Document upload is being finalized and queued for processing...

classifying.details: The AI is analyzing the document to determine its type and structure for optimal processing...

extracting.details: Advanced AI models are reading through the document and extracting key information and data points...

detecting.details: The AI is identifying impairments and required scoring factors...

scoring.details: The AI is calculating impairment sub-totals and overall score...

analyzing.details: Our underwriting AI is performing comprehensive analysis to identify risks, discrepancies, and insights...

acting.details: The AI agent is making decisions and taking appropriate actions based on the analysis results...

complete.details: Analysis complete! Review the detailed results and AI recommendations below.

failed.details: An error occurred during processing. Please try again or contact support.

error.details: An error occurred during processing. Please try again or contact support.
